department: Canada Economic Development for the Quebec Regions
short_summary: Request for quotation (such as RFP (request for proposal) and RFQ (request for quotation))
description: This tender is for: Canada Economic Development for Quebec Regions is seeking an Oracle and SQL Specialist on site and on Cloud (databases and application servers) for a Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) under the TBIPS Supply Arrangement (SA) method of supply. The mandate is essentially for a bank of hours to support our internal resource in specific and highly specialized tasks. The mandated resource will be required to perform various tasks on databases or application servers.",
